person.name: Craig A. Cardon
person.description: Elder Craig A. Cardon was sustained a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on March 31, 2012. At the time of his call, he had been serving as a member of the Second Quorum of the Seventy since April 1, 2006. He currently serves as an assistant Executive Director of the Priesthood Department and assists in supervising two North American areas. He previously served as president of the Africa West Area.
